c35fe1e5-fca9-4941-b244-53265b58a70e.description: The Best Friends Executive Leadership Certification program is exclusive to participants nominated by Best Friends regional and national directors and approved by a selection team. This six-month certification facilitates the strengthening of executive leadership skills of top-level animal services professionals and prepares those making a transition into animal services from another field. The program supports ending the killing of pets in animal shelters.
c35fe1e5-fca9-4941-b244-53265b58a70e.name: Animal Services Executive Leadership

badge_template_activities.title: This program supports ending the killing of pets in animal shelters.

d40b5fb2-1bcd-43ea-bddb-991c107f5b52.description: This badge represents successful completion of Best Friends Principles of Contemporary Animal Services certificate program. With content curated by Best Friends Animal Society and leading practitioners and researchers in the field, participants gain an awareness and understanding of contemporary animal services as a profession. This six-week program supports ending the killing of pets in animal shelters.
d40b5fb2-1bcd-43ea-bddb-991c107f5b52.name: Principles of Contemporary Animal Services

badge_template_activities.title: This course includes online modules, assessments, reading reflections and a summary paper. Students are encouraged to participate in discussions relevant to their modules and assignments, with the end goal of building a learning community focused on contemporary animal services as a profession.

b40115c8-3f5c-474b-a3af-c648c4635eb4.description: Earners of this certificate have successfully completed a career course about Utah’s dynamic tourism industry. Learners are taught the skills necessary to significantly contribute to the state's destination management field. Highlights of the certificate include effective customer service and leadership skills, stewardship, outdoor recreation and relationship management. This program combines expertise from those who work with the National Parks in southern Utah and Utah Tourism Industry Assn.
b40115c8-3f5c-474b-a3af-c648c4635eb4.name: Utah Parks & Tourism

badge_template_activities.title: Uniquely, this certificate program combines expertise from those who work with the National Parks in southern Utah, as well as some of the region's outstanding tourism industry experts serving as guest presenters throughout the course. An understanding of Utah's parks system, tourism marketing and hospitality management are also included to prepare participants for success in this fast-paced industry. A live learning lab Southern Utah FAM Tour is included in this certificate experience.

d5616beb-ff3d-431d-b2d5-15a8a06b411c.description: The SUU Project Management career certificate prepares participants with the necessary knowledge to enter a project management career with skills and confidence. Earners of this badge are prepared to become certified through PMI with the globally recognized Certified Associate in Project Management (CAPM®) credential. The course text for this program is Project Management Institute's (PMI) industry standard, “A Guide to the Project Management Body of Knowledge® (PMBOK).”
d5616beb-ff3d-431d-b2d5-15a8a06b411c.name: Project Management

alignments.name: Project Management Institute
alignments.description: The Project Management Certificate focuses on the practical application and best practices of the project management framework as outlined in the Project Management Institute's “A Guide to the Project Management Body of Knowledge® (PMBOK).”

badge_template_activities.title: This course offers a critical and comprehensive initiation to the practice and world of project management. Importantly, this course also prepares participants to become certified through PMI with the globally recognized Certified Associate in Project Management (CAPM®) credential. The CAPM® certification validates the candidate’s knowledge and experience as well as their abilities to take on critical roles and responsibilities within the organization.

2e1acab3-61c1-4096-931b-35e8ffcf0999.description: The Cat Lifesaving Certification (CLC) program engages mid-and senior-level animal welfare professionals in lessons and discussions around saving the lives of cats. This comprehensive course will redefine what an adoptable cat is and explore options for positive outcomes in communities across the nation. Participants will learn about the proven policies, programs, and procedures necessary to meet the community’s expectations of cat lifesaving.
2e1acab3-61c1-4096-931b-35e8ffcf0999.name: Animal Services Cat Lifesaving Certificate

badge_template_activities.title: The program leverages the lifesaving knowledge and skills of practitioners. The certificate offers clarity on what success looks like and is also an opportunity for participants to deepen their learning and understanding of positive results. Additionally, Best Friends Animal Society’s goal is to assist organizations in being reflective of their community’s cultural diversity so that everyone feels comfortable and welcomed.

d9bde7f4-c781-4072-a9e7-26bf92bc28b0.description: The Animal Services Management Leadership Certification program is a six-month certification course that facilitates the strengthening of leadership skills of top-level animal services leaders (as well as professionals making a transition into animal services from another field) for the purpose of ending the killing of pets in animal shelters.
d9bde7f4-c781-4072-a9e7-26bf92bc28b0.name: Animal Services Manager Leadership

badge_template_activities.title: The Management Leadership Certification program is a six-month certification course that facilitates the strengthening of leadership skills of top-level animal services leaders, as well as professionals making a transition into animal services from another field, for the purpose of ending the killing of pets in animal shelters.

6c1a81d3-9c27-487c-ac0d-f9a73bae769b.description: Earners of this badge have completed an online and hybrid environment course for addressing ways K-12 instructors can organize resources, design high-quality courses and activities, and ensure that students are interacting with content, each other and their instructor. Modules include course design, integration of high-quality media, and resources and tools to supplement learning materials.
6c1a81d3-9c27-487c-ac0d-f9a73bae769b.name: Online and Remote Teaching Foundations

badge_template_activities.title: Define and implement best practices of online and hybrid course design. Identify and organize high-quality media, resources and tools to supplement learning materials. Create active learning opportunities for learners in your course(s). Design ways to provide feedback explicitly aligned with learning objectives and construct actionable, growth-oriented feedback. Create instructor-generated and student-generated interactions, including student-content, student-student and student-instructor.

bb89df09-69c3-470e-9a68-624a12dbaead.description: This three-month certificate program is designed for those interested in starting an animal sanctuary and who are not looking to work in a municipal shelter or humane society. Badge earners have learned from Best Friends’ experts, history, experience, knowledge, resources and insights in creating a successful organization. This program features online self-study, live weekly Zoom calls and a five-day, in-person experience at Best Friends Animal Sanctuary in Kanab, Utah.
bb89df09-69c3-470e-9a68-624a12dbaead.name: Running a Lifesaving Animal Sanctuary

badge_template_activities.title: Running a Lifesaving Animal Sanctuary is a three-month hybrid course offering online self-study, live weekly Zoom calls and a five-day, in-person experience at Best Friends Animal Sanctuary in Kanab, Utah. The in-person experience includes a tour of the facilities and live classes with animal care experts, plus group and individual mentoring.

a72c2601-12ed-4d6b-927c-9543cdf2c562.description: This badge is awarded to participants who complete a short course in professionalism, leadership, communication, cultural readiness, critical thinking, customer service, career development, project management, professional brand, and teamwork.
a72c2601-12ed-4d6b-927c-9543cdf2c562.name: T-Bird 10 Professional Skills

badge_template_activities.title: This course teaches 10 professional development skills identified by southwest Utah regional employers for preparing candidates for success in the workplace. Each skill is taught through a podcast interview with professional experts working in Utah. Course time = 10 hours.

96adf939-ac65-4450-a145-bbf413d68d10.description: Those who complete this course learn the basic skills necessary to become a help desk professional, including help desk responsibilities, software navigation and management, networking, and troubleshooting skills.
96adf939-ac65-4450-a145-bbf413d68d10.name: IT Help Desk

badge_template_activities.title: This ten hour, self pacing course teaches the basic skills needed by a help desk professional, including help desk responsibilities, software navigation and management, networking, and troubleshooting skills.

788f3a96-0c3c-4765-ab35-2f821856eb02.description: The Dog Lifesaving Certification (DLC) program engages mid- and senior-level animal welfare professionals in lessons and discussions around saving the lives of dogs. This comprehensive course will redefine what an adoptable dog is and explore options for positive outcomes in communities across the nation. Participants will learn about the proven policies, programs and procedures necessary to meet the community’s expectation of dog lifesaving.
788f3a96-0c3c-4765-ab35-2f821856eb02.name: Animal Services Dog Lifesaving Certficate

badge_template_activities.title: The program leverages the lifesaving knowledge and skills of practitioners. The certificate offers clarity on what success looks like and is also an opportunity for participants to deepen their learning and understanding of positive results. Additionally, Best Friends Animal Society’s goal is to assist organizations in being reflective of their community’s cultural diversity so that everyone feels comfortable and welcomed.

a0467023-131e-4cbb-97d1-ba6bff64a8bd.description: Iron Leaders Academy, presented by Southern Utah University, provides opportunities for personal and professional growth among emerging and established leaders in Iron County through a high-impact, 10-month training schedule. Participants will gain the foundational knowledge and experience to contribute to positive change in the community.
a0467023-131e-4cbb-97d1-ba6bff64a8bd.name: Iron Leaders Academy

badge_template_activities.title: Culmination of the experience results in a graduation ceremony and award of an SUU Institutional Certificate.

ef72e6f6-1da0-464a-b387-e11bcd46a19f.description: Earners gained advanced training and practical skills with Amazon Web Services (AWS). Course modules explore the fundamental concepts of cloud computing, the economics and billing associated with AWS, the global infrastructure components of AWS, security and compliance, networking features, computing alternatives, storage options, database options, cloud architectural design, scalability and monitoring.
ef72e6f6-1da0-464a-b387-e11bcd46a19f.name: Amazon Web Services Academy Cloud Foundation Certificate

badge_template_activities.title: Learning resources include lecture videos, online multiple-choice knowledge checks, lecture materials, lab exercises, and instructor-led mentoring sessions and demonstrations. You will work independently to complete assigned learning modules, have opportunities to interact with fellow students in online forums and have the opportunity to interact weekly with the course instructor to reinforce key learning objectives for the week.

5e5360f7-545f-4ff9-95f7-fc145dba435b.description: Earners of this badge have learned fundamental concepts for security, including planning, risk management, cryptography, network security, system hardening, and policy.
5e5360f7-545f-4ff9-95f7-fc145dba435b.name: Cybersecurity Foundations

badge_template_activities.title: This self-pacing, online introduction to Cybersecurity contains ten hours of online instruction. The course will teach the basics of what cybersecurity is, how it has developed, and the tools used in the trade to keep people and organizations safe from online threats and attacks. This course is developed in partnership with GuardSight and SUU Computer Science and Information Systems.

ca451e84-4928-4e3c-845a-9ec80aad3e4c.description: The Alumni Leadership Academy is a six-week certificate program for developing technical leadership skills and gaining access to the SUU national alumni network. Using a transformational leadership framework, this certificate is designed for SUU alumni and friends. Participants learn from SUU alumni who exemplify leadership across the country. By engaging in this leadership program, participants have opportunities to connect and network with fellow alumni representing a variety of industries.
ca451e84-4928-4e3c-845a-9ec80aad3e4c.name: Alumni Leadership Academy

badge_template_activities.title: The Alumni Leadership Academy is a six-week certificate program designed to help you develop technical leadership skills. Offered exclusively to alumni and their friends, you’ll learn from SUU alumni who exemplify leadership across the country. By engaging in this leadership program, you’ll have many opportunities to reconnect and network with fellow alumni.

d51226eb-ad26-4818-81bc-eb5b6221fd32.description: This SUU graduate-level certificate program emphasizes systems-based operational approaches and is tailored to the professional manager who is committed to continuous improvement. Principles are applicable across government, healthcare, education and industry. Earners of this badge have demonstrated a comprehensive understanding of how differences between systems-focused organizational models and traditional top-down organizational models affect organizational performance and productivity.
d51226eb-ad26-4818-81bc-eb5b6221fd32.name: Systems Management

badge_template_activities.title: Total Quality Management, Zero-Defect methods, Six Sigma Quality, Operational Excellence and Lean Management. Analyze and synthesize the ideas of various systems thinkers and apply this conceptual knowledge to address practical managerial dilemmas. Engage in project-based learning exercises that are focused on developing strategies for building trust among teams operating within physical as well as virtual spaces within different departments, divisions teams both within and across organizations.

e77f8e7f-acb6-49ee-bae5-bb2aa225084c.description: Designed and taught by industry professionals, this informational course will helps students understand what SaaS is, important terminology, metrics and its business model. It also covers possible careers in building new SaaS and helping maintain existing software.
e77f8e7f-acb6-49ee-bae5-bb2aa225084c.name: Software as a Service

badge_template_activities.title: This ten hour, self pacing course teaches the basic skills of a profession in Software as a Service. The course covers building a SaaS business (Software as a Service), skills that are needed in the industry and terminology used in the business.

95ee8e1e-654b-4780-93a8-dae79acf7586.description: Earners of this certificate are managers and emerging business leaders seeking to increase their value, contribution, and performance in the workplace. In this certificate program, participants gain exclusive access to industry experts and revered leaders in online and in-person learning settings featuring knowledge sharing, learning key leadership principles and project management skills, and practicing best strategies for success.
95ee8e1e-654b-4780-93a8-dae79acf7586.name: Better Your Business

badge_template_activities.title: Better Your Business is designed to help aspiring leaders gain the skills and knowledge needed to elevate their professional development. It gives students an opportunity to learn essential skills and helpful knowledge directly from business owners and industry experts. Through online and in-person learning experiences, participants learn and practice key concepts for successful leadership in business environments.

287ccd1f-c7e1-4479-b833-58bbc2409652.description: Earners have completed the nationally recognized Guest Service Gold® Tourism training developed by the American Hotel and Lodging Educational Institute. Upon completion students are equipped with both the hard and soft skills for success with customer engagement.
287ccd1f-c7e1-4479-b833-58bbc2409652.name: Tourism Guest Service Gold

badge_template_activities.title: Guest Service Gold is a certification offered by the American Hotel and Lodging Educational Institute. It has been adopted by the Utah Tourism Industry Association as an industry standard across the state. Customer service training elements will be applied as participants navigate industry specific, real life scenarios.

fcdd5122-8db5-40cd-88f0-ce28aa11a1b6.description: This program trains entire school teams through a safe, positive, and meaningful method of preventing and responding to dangerous and aggressive student behavior. ASPEN is superior to every other student behavior training program out there because it is the ONLY program that infuses components of positive psychology into systems of tiered support and student behavioral analysis.
fcdd5122-8db5-40cd-88f0-ce28aa11a1b6.name: Aspen Student Behavior Training

badge_template_activities.title: Through a 7-module course, school teams will learn important methods for analyzing student behavior and responding to any aggressive student behavior. Totem gives schools the tools they need to teach and care for students in safe, understanding environments. Through ASPEN, school systems will learn to understand student behavior and utilize optimistic teaming.

94bf3d51-becc-470a-8615-b4b90ee5000a.description: During the Best Friends National Conference, participants connect with animal welfare leaders from across the country, unite with like-minded animal welfare supporters and gain knowledge to save the lives of more homeless pets in their communities.
94bf3d51-becc-470a-8615-b4b90ee5000a.name: Best Friends National Conference

badge_template_activities.title: You can enhance your conference experience by earning an SUU Institutional Certificate and Continuing Education Units (CEUs). CEUs earned at SUU may be applied toward Certified Animal Welfare Administrator (CAWA) certification.

a9949905-4848-495f-9026-abadffbe0114.description: The Best Friends Professional Development Symposium is a dynamic online learning event for animal services professionals and students devoted to creating lifesaving innovation and revolutionary change for pets and people.
a9949905-4848-495f-9026-abadffbe0114.name: Best Friends Professional Development Symposium

badge_template_activities.title: Your successful participation in the symposium will result in one Southern Utah University continuing education unit (CEU) and one certificate of completion (80% minimum attendance at the live online event is required). Plus, if you choose, you can earn three professional development (PRODEV) credits that can be applied toward a bachelor’s degree or master of interdisciplinary studies (MIS), master of public administration (MPA) or master of business administration (MBA) at SUU.

9b2d48ea-fefc-4cdf-8725-1453d38e7624.description: By earning this certificate, learners have demonstrated they are prepared to start a childcare business in a rural community.
9b2d48ea-fefc-4cdf-8725-1453d38e7624.name: Business Basics of Child Care

badge_template_activities.title: This class is designed to provide participants with a basic understanding of growing a childcare business including marketing strategies, pricing strategies, accounting principles, leadership skills and access to local business resources. This course caters to child care business development in rural communities.

b6693b65-59dd-4a89-a37d-27669d52e87d.description: Earners of this badge have successfully completed an overview of the many aspects of information assurance and cyber security. Participants have researched and analyzed case studies and have been introduced to management, technical and administrative aspects of cyber security. Several hands-on learning projects are used in this course to reinforce the core concepts.
b6693b65-59dd-4a89-a37d-27669d52e87d.name: Cyber Security Fundamentals

badge_template_activities.title: Recognize potential threats to confidentiality, integrity and availability of information Define information security and assurance terminology and basics of security technologies including cryptography, authentication, access control, network, application and physical security Demonstrate risk management and the use of security policy Perform basic hardening techniques on various operating systems Discuss incident response and disaster recovery plans.

aab9fb83-1867-4dba-a5ea-c585606e1979.description: Earners of this certificate have completed three courses in the SUU School of Education: Information and Technology in Education, Creating and Managing a Learning Environment, and School Law.
aab9fb83-1867-4dba-a5ea-c585606e1979.name: Enriched Teaching Skills & Practices for the Professional Instructor

badge_template_activities.title: Examine relevant legal issues that affect the organization and administration of public schools. Understand the historical, philosophical, psychological and cultural influences that affect legal decisions in the public schools. Demonstrate how to exercise discretion in making rational and legally defensible decisions that affect students and school personnel.

ecd56789-e030-425e-8461-d03e2844e056.description: Managing a giant group of kids (at any age) is way more difficult than people think. Earners of this certificate have successfully completed the Happy Class classroom management course. Tools and strategies to use in the K-12 classroom, like, right now.
ecd56789-e030-425e-8461-d03e2844e056.name: Happy Class

badge_template_activities.title: The Happy Class Training Modules are designed to cover everything your teaching training program didn’t. Specifically, how to manage a gigantic class of unruly kids (at any age or grade) in a positive, student-centered way.

a159f08b-6a3e-4b50-a5e0-91f94def1fe2.description: The Leadership Studies Institutional Certificate is designed to dive deep into leadership approaches, processes and traits by identifying skills and styles of leadership. You will develop and apply your own individual expertise. Learn the psychological aspects of leadership including culture, ethics, and gender. Learn to create and lead effective groups and teams. By the certificate end, you’ll have a portfolio and build an ongoing improvement plan.
a159f08b-6a3e-4b50-a5e0-91f94def1fe2.name: Leadership Studies

badge_template_activities.title: Expected learning outcomes include: How to analyze basic leadership approaches, processes, and traits How to gain a foundational knowledge of leadership by identifying skills and styles of leadership How to draft a vision plan to include communication and innovation How to delve deeper into interpersonal portions of leadership knowledge, skills, and abilities How to develop and apply their own individual expertise How psychological aspects of leadership can impact culture, ethics, and gender

3623bfa0-d71f-4953-9e8e-f4ea19e30dc9.description: Earners developed a leadership framework, reviewed emotional intelligence and practiced problem solving current challenges in the industry.
3623bfa0-d71f-4953-9e8e-f4ea19e30dc9.name: Leadership & Tourism Management

badge_template_activities.title: Short course with an introduction to the leadership challenge framework, opportunities for reflection on personal leadership skills and opportunities, emotional intelligence and practice in problem solving authentic and current challenges in the tourism industry. Participants explore their personal leadership story and create a plan to develop leadership skills.

6343804b-126f-4910-b957-0d9b8d242dff.description: The earner of this badge has completed Totem Parapro training for employing a paraprofessional workforce. A basic training program for those on the frontlines.
6343804b-126f-4910-b957-0d9b8d242dff.name: Parapro

badge_template_activities.title: Can you imagine a world wherein schools place the least experienced, least trained employees to work with the most vulnerable and some cases most difficult students? (Oh wait! That’s not our imagination! That’s the real world!) Stop the madness and use this training to appropriately onboard your paraprofessional workforce.

0d281f5d-ec98-46b7-b6b9-87066ea41c9f.description: Parks & Public Lands Stewardship certificate represents knowledge, perspective and active participation in stewardship of parks and public lands. By combining internship or volunteer experience with the opportunity to set professional goals, practice communication skills, and think critically through readings, discussions, and interviews, students gain a unique understanding of public land missions, practices and histories.
0d281f5d-ec98-46b7-b6b9-87066ea41c9f.name: Parks & Public Lands Stewardship

badge_template_activities.title: Parks & Public Lands Stewardship

f0b2c5e1-7722-4b71-9ab1-d6de59ddd664.description: Earners of this digital badge successfully completed a six-week, rapid learning seminar for responding to demands associated with managing work and teams remotely. Learning activities complemented by industry experts focused on four key areas: 1) best practices for online conferencing and collaborating with teams, 2) creating online content libraries, 3) effective time management and project management, 4) leading from anywhere.
f0b2c5e1-7722-4b71-9ab1-d6de59ddd664.name: Remote Work Tools

badge_template_activities.title: Completion of a six-week online course comprised of learning modules and assignments in the following areas: best practices for conferencing and collaborating with teams; skills for creating online content libraries; managing time like a pro; project management skills to keep workflow moving; what a day in the life of a remote leader looks like featuring Ticketmaster and Best Friends Animal Society teams. Additional requirements: Reading Up Discourse book discussion and live learning sessions.

a7fba8c8-4f2d-4302-b2dc-b917bdf56997.description: Earners of this badge gained an understanding of the tourism, hospitality and outdoor recreations industries, including the unique differences within them and the importance of teamwork between public and private organizations.
a7fba8c8-4f2d-4302-b2dc-b917bdf56997.name: Tourism & Outdoor Recreation

badge_template_activities.title: A comprehensive view of how the interrelated branches of the tourism industry work together, communicate and collaborate to meet the needs of customers. It includes foundations of hospitality skills and outdoor recreation, offering fluency with critical jargon and acronyms within the industry, as well as a foundational look at industry pathways for career development. This course examines sustainable tourism as a framework, including ecological, economic and cultural sustainability.
